input.sentences: the naked santa run was a town tradition .
the cops wished they could arrest the runners .
people that did n't want to participate showed support by wearing holiday colors .
the final destination of the run was this parkinglot .
in the windows people looked out | waiting for the naked santas to arrive .
output.sentences: The "Angry Naked X Elf"parade attracted hundreds of participants.
Policemen were close by in case of retaliation.
The Happy Elf Brigade showed up.
But they were too late, the parade was already over.
The Happy Elf Brigade returned home, swearing to catch them next time.
